oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Marian Clements to Margaret Croft about weaving
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter to Margaret Croft from Marian Clements at The Weaving Room in Abingdon, Virginia. Marian shares her delight that Margaret has learned to weave and asks for two books by Jay Hambidge. Marian invites Margaret to visit her in Abingdon, writing "I feel as if I knew you as a personal friend despite the fact that I have never seen you."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Clements, Marian C.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hand weaving; Textile crafts; Fiberwork; Women weavers; Stores, Retail--Tennessee; Craft shops
